name: Sandwich Hero (leoquint)
description: Sandwich Hero is a yummy little game where you launch a slice of bread out of a toaster, controlling it's flight to catch delicious toppings to make one big, delicious sandwich! Tilt your device left and right to guide the airborne bread towards the toppings as it ascends, and towards the condiments as it descends towards your plate. The more ingredients you get in a row on your ingredient list, the higher you score!
